row.task_desc: Explain relationship between databases and relational algebra.
Explain unions, exclusions, intersections, and cartesian products.
Guide students through implementing a simple database.
Explain purpose and implementation of 1st through 3rd normal forms.
Explain purpose and implementation of Boyce-Codd and 4th normal forms.

row.inst_guidance: Use material from red textbook to develop understanding of relational algebra.
row.objective_statement: Identify fundamentals of relational algebra. Demonstrate understanding of unions, exclusions, intersections, and cartesian products.

row.evaluation: Demonstrate functioning database with three tables of ten records each.
row.inst_guidance: Describe the basics of a relational database to students using tutorials from W3Schools.
row.objective_statement: Identify fundamental components of a relational database. Demonstrate understanding of keys, records, and columns.

row.evaluation: Correct provided database in accordance with 4th Normal Form.
row.inst_guidance: Describe purpose and rules of normalization using tutorials from W3Schools.
row.objective_statement: Identify purpose and rules of normalization up to at least the 4th Normal Form
